translations: 了不起的人或事；嘹亮的歌

sentences.sentence: One goal for Chelsea all season, and a belter on his Under-18s international debut!
sentences.translation: 整季为切尔西打进一球，替18岁以下国家队处子登场就马上取得入球！

sentences.sentence: I remember playing Chelsea in 2005 and Tiago scoring a belter from long-range that nobody would have saved.
sentences.translation: 我记得2005年踢切尔西的时候蒂亚戈打进了一个远射，没人救得了。
